About Us

Nazim Fabricators has been a trusted name in metal fabrication for over 15 years. We take pride in our craftsmanship and dedication to quality, serving clients in Kharghar, Navi Mumbai, and beyond.

Our team of skilled fabricators specializes in a wide range of metal fabrication services, including gate fabrication, grill design, rolling shutters, collapsible gates, steel railing, roofing sheds, aluminum sliding doors, and more.

At Nazim Fabricators, we believe in delivering superior craftsmanship, innovative design solutions, and exceptional customer service. Our goal is to exceed our clients' expectations and build lasting relationships based on trust and reliability.

FAQ

Frequenty asked questions

Why you have a price range instead of a single price for a service?

The exact cost depends on the type of material you need to use and the overall design you choose therefore we provide range instead of exact price.

How do you take payments?

We take from 10-20% of the payment in advance and rest of the payment within 10 days of project completion.
